snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown has extended his executive order requiring Californians to conserve water as the state prepares for a fifth year of drought.
abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown extends executive order requiring communities in state to reduce water consumption by 25 percent in 2015; extension grants expanded powers to officials as they seek to combat drought and prepare for extreme weather conditions.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown has extended his executive order requiring Californians to conserve water as the state prepares for a fifth year of drought.

headline.main: Water Conservation Order Is Extended in California
headline.print_headline: Water Conservation Order Is Extended in California
